title: 打了材质包之后游戏疯狂崩溃
author: ZacRoman
txt_content:
游戏版本为1.14.4 已经加载了Forge和Optfine
以下为崩溃报告：
游戏核心：1.14.4
启动内存：1024 MB
操作系统：Microsoft Windows 10 专业版 x64
————————————————————
CPU：#0Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700 CPU @ 3.20GHz 
内存：16297
显卡：#0NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 
————————————————————
核心路径：E:\BakaXl\.minecraft\versions\1.14.4
Java信息：C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_251\bin\javaw.exe (Java1.80 32 Bit)
BakaXL路径：E:\BakaXl\BakaXL_Public_Ver_3.0.1.0.exe
————————————————————
错误日志：
---- Minecraft崩溃报告 ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

Time: 20-5-12 上午9:54
崩溃类型： Unexpected error

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Image is not allocated.
        at cuj.g(SourceFile:143)
        at cuj.a(SourceFile:344)
        at cyk.a(SourceFile:72)

        at cyc.b(SourceFile:410)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:155)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Thread: Client thread
Stacktrace:

        at cuj.a(SourceFile:344)
        at cyk.a(SourceFile:72)
        at dnc.p(SourceFile:702)

-- Affected level --
Details:
        All players: 1 total; [dmp['ZacRoman'/206, l='MpServer', x=195.50, y=82.00, z=-194.50]]
        Chunk stats: Client Chunk Cache: 361, 225
        Level dimension: minecraft:overworld
        Level name: MpServer
        Level seed: 0
        Level generator: ID 00 - default, ver 1. Features enabled: false
        Level generator options: {}
        Level spawn location: World: (192,81,-191), Chunk: (at 0,5,1 in 12,-12; contains blocks 192,0,-192 to 207,255,-177), Region: (0,-1; contains chunks 0,-32 to 31,-1, blocks 0,0,-512 to 511,255,-1)
        Level time: 171 game time, 171 day time
        Level storage version: 0x00000 - Unknown?
        Level weather: Rain time: 0 (now: false), thunder time: 0 (now: false)
        Level game mode: Game mode: creative (ID 1). Hardcore: false. Cheats: false
        Server brand: vanilla
        Server type: Integrated singleplayer server
Stacktrace:
        at dkf.a(SourceFile:421)
        at cyc.b(SourceFile:1923)

        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:155)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.14.4

Using framebuffer objects because OpenGL 3.0 is supported and separate blending is supported.

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
卸载之前安装的所有 java ，安装这个 https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe

然后在启动器中分配更多的内存

replies.author: kengshi_233
replies.txt_content: 最简单的办法：尝试更换材质包
